ygData.messageBody:
Okay, some info about magis from me:

1. Earth Ele cast a short duration stun spell. This is noticeable if you fight spell
casting mobs with your pet like treants. The stun part is often resisted.

2. Bolt as long as you have a clear line of vision before you cast the spell will chase
the mob around, even if it went behind you.

3. Bolt for hell sake is slower then shock but does more damage.

> From: "Tommy Fong" <tommyfong@...>
>
> On Thu, 30 Sep 1999 10:00:07 +0800, LKW wrote:
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >1. Hmm, I think it's the other way round leh. Bolt cast faster than shock,

> >tonight.
